verses.text: \w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w earthly|strong="G1919"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \add this\add* \w tabernacle|strong="G4636"\w* were \w dissolved|strong="G2647"\w*, we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w building|strong="G3619"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, an \w house|strong="G3614"\w* not made with \w hands|strong="G0886"\w*, \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* we \w groan|strong="G4727"\w*, earnestly \w desiring|strong="G1971"\w* to be clothed \w upon|strong="G1902"\w* with \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w house|strong="G3613"\w* which is \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*:

\w If|strong="G1489"\w* so be \w that|strong="G2532"\w* being \w clothed|strong="G1746"\w* we \w shall|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w naked|strong="G1131"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we that \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add this\add* \w tabernacle|strong="G4636"\w* do \w groan|strong="G4727"\w*, being \w burdened|strong="G0916"\w*: \w not|strong="G2309"\w* \w for|strong="G1894"\w* \w that|strong="G3756"\w* we \w would|strong="G1562"\w* be \w unclothed|strong="G0235"\w*, \w but|strong="G1902"\w* \w clothed|strong="G2443"\w* upon, \w that|strong="G2666"\w* \w mortality|strong="G5259"\w* might be swallowed \w up|strong="G2222"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w wrought|strong="G2716"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w selfsame|strong="G0846"\w* \w thing|strong="G5124"\w* \add is\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* the \w earnest|strong="G0728"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \add we are\add* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w confident|strong="G2292"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w whilst|strong="G2532"\w* we are at \w home|strong="G1736"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, we are \w absent|strong="G1553"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*:
(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w sight|strong="G1491"\w*:)

We are \w confident|strong="G2292"\w*, \add I say\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w willing|strong="G2106"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* to be \w absent|strong="G1553"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to be \w present|strong="G1736"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* we \w labour|strong="G5389"\w*, \w that|strong="G2532"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w present|strong="G1736"\w* \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w absent|strong="G1553"\w*, we may \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w accepted|strong="G2101"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w appear|strong="G5319"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* the judgment \w seat|strong="G0968"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* may \w receive|strong="G2865"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \add done\add* \w in|strong="G1223"\w* \add his\add* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w according|strong="G4314"\w* to \w that|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w done|strong="G4238"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add it be\add* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w bad|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* the \w terror|strong="G5401"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, we \w persuade|strong="G3982"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* we are made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* I \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* are made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w consciences|strong="G4893"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w occasion|strong="G0874"\w* to \w glory|strong="G2745"\w* on \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w behalf|strong="G5228"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w have|strong="G2192"\w* somewhat \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \add answer\add* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w appearance|strong="G4383"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* in \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* we be beside \w ourselves|strong="G1839"\w*, \add it is\add* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: or \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* we be \w sober|strong="G4993"\w*, \add it is\add* for your \w cause|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w constraineth|strong="G4912"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*; \w because|strong="G5124"\w* we thus \w judge|strong="G2919"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w then|strong="G0686"\w* \w were|strong="G0599"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* he \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* which \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w should|strong="G2198"\w* not \w henceforth|strong="G3371"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* unto \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* unto \w him|strong="G3588"\w* which \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* rose \w again|strong="G1453"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w henceforth|strong="G3568"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*: \w yea|strong="G1161"\w*, \w though|strong="G1487"\w* we have \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w yet|strong="G0235"\w* now \w henceforth|strong="G3568"\w* know \w we|strong="G1097"\w* \add him\add* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \add be\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \add he is\add* a \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w creature|strong="G2937"\w*: old \w things|strong="G0744"\w* are passed \w away|strong="G3928"\w*; \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* are \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \add are\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w reconciled|strong="G2644"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* to \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w* the \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w* of \w reconciliation|strong="G2643"\w*;

To \w wit|strong="G5613"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* Christ, \w reconciling|strong="G2644"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* unto \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w imputing|strong="G3049"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w trespasses|strong="G3900"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w committed|strong="G5087"\w* \w unto|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w reconciliation|strong="G2643"\w*.

Now \w then|strong="G3767"\w* we are \w ambassadors|strong="G4243"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* did \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \add you\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*: we \w pray|strong="G1189"\w* \add you\add* \w in|strong="G5228"\w* \w Christâ€™s stead|strong="G5547"\w*, be ye \w reconciled|strong="G2644"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he hath made \w him|strong="G4160"\w* \add to be\add* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, who \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* might be \w made|strong="G1096"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.
